title: Updated Google Pixel to android version 10 after which, audio is not working!!
content:
Pixel version 1 updated to Android version 10.
Audio is not working no notifications.
When attending to the calls, I can hear the other person clearly, however on the other side I am not being audible.
Even the headphone jack there is no audio coming.
I believe when Android 10 is launched the architecture planned was only for newer version like pixel 4 which didn't posses these hardware.
Google please fix these drivers for the hardware!!!
